RM - SProp.from sentence: During training , we use RM - SProp with an initial learning rate of 1 10 ?4 .

set.from sentence: We set the momentum to be 0 ( adopted from ) and the weight decay to be 1 10 ?5 .

train.from sentence: We train for 240 epoches , and the learning rate is reduced to 1 10 ?5 and 1 10 ? 6 after 80 and 160 epoches .

Data augmentation.from sentence: Data augmentation is performed with random rotation ( 50 ) , translation ( 25 px ) , flipping ( 50 % ) , and rescaling ( 15 % ) .

used.from sentence: Random Gaussian blur , noise and occlusion are also used .
